-- Generated by tailwind-generator, be careful when editing this file

module Tailwind exposing (
  Tailwind,
  tailwind,
  unwrap,
  {% for class in classes %}{{class|name}}{% if !loop.last %},
  {% endif %}{% endfor %}
  )

import Html
import Html.Attributes as Attributes
import List

type Tailwind
    = Tailwind String

unwrap : List Tailwind -> String
unwrap cs =
    cs |> List.map (\(Tailwind c) -> c) |> String.join " "

tailwind : List Tailwind -> Html.Attribute msg
tailwind cs =
    Attributes.class <| unwrap cs


{% for class in classes %}
{{class|name}} : Tailwind
{{class|name}} =
    Tailwind "{{class}}"

{% endfor %}
